item.title: Back to it
item.description: We’ll see how long I keep this up, but it is something I’ve needed to do for a while now. The majority of these posts will probably refer to my software/tech side of life. But for now I’ll just get it all started off with a fact about tea: There is a special name for when tea leaves uncurl as hot water is poured over them. It is called â€œthe agony of the leaves.
